    • Uses of IRemoteConnection in common

      Methods in common that return IRemoteConnection 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      IRemoteConnection IMember.getRemoteConnection()
      This method allows Users who only have access to each others' IMember stubs to communicate at the IStaffImplRemoteConnection level, i.e.
      Methods in common with parameters of type IRemoteConnection 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void IRemoteConnection.connect​(IRemoteConnection remoteConnectionStub)
      Used to connect to another chat app.
      void IRemoteConnection.quit​(IRemoteConnection remoteConnectionStub)
      Tells the remote system that holds this IStaffImplRemoteConnection object that the given IStaffImplRemoteConnection stub is no longer valid and should be removed from their system.
